name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon to Alibaba Auto Supplier Finder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates the search for suppliers on Alibaba based on Amazon product images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Amazon to Alibaba Auto Supplier Finder - Simplify Your Supplier Search

This free chrome extension allows you to discover suppliers on Alibaba directly from Amazon product images. The Amazon to Alibaba Auto Supplier Finder Chrome extension streamlines your sourcing process, helping you connect with relevant suppliers in seconds.

Perfect for Amazon sellers and sourcing professionals, this extension uses Amazon product images to find matching suppliers on Alibaba, making sourcing faster and more efficient.

🎯 Key Benefits:

🚀 Supplier Lookups
Use Amazon images as references to quickly search for suppliers on Alibaba, ensuring that you can find relevant suppliers with ease.

📊 Organized Dashboard
Keep track of your sourcing data in a single, organized dashboard, helping you stay focused and manage supplier research effortlessly.

📝 Add Custom Notes
Capture important insights with custom notes, helping you keep track of details for each entry.

🔍 Monitor Essential Product Information
Gain key insights by tracking important details, such as Alibaba and Amazon URLs and product images, to support better sourcing decisions.

🔐 Privacy-First Approach
All of your tracked data remains private. We don't save any of your research data on our servers!

🖥️ Seamless Browser Integration
Integrates effortlessly into your browser, enhancing your Amazon experience without interruptions.

🎁 Completely Free to Use: Enjoy all the features without any cost – no hidden fees.

Disclaimer: This extension is independently developed and is not affiliated with Amazon, Alibaba, or their associated companies. Please use the data as a guideline and verify critical information independently. A free license key is required to activate and use the extension.
